pollingInterval.ui:help: Provide a number and a unit (s = second, m = minute, h = hour). Defaults to 5s.

query.ui:help: The query must select the keys into columns with specific names. The columns from the change tracked table must be named [Dependency.<column>], where <column> is the name of the column. The columns from the view or query must be named [Schema.<column>].
